comments: Instead of putting the gear lever in L, you should have pushed the little button that is almost hidden on the back of the lever. This puts it in sport mode, and changes the transmission programming.
They nailed the styling, this is a very good looking little car right up there with the Mazda 3 for me.  Still would not buy one.
All said, this review is a lot more positive than I thought it would be. Good Review guys!
Why does everyone miss the ECO and Sport mode? Sport mode changes the car completely
I agree that it looks better than before and a new SER version could be interesting IF they cared to retune the suspension and give it a decent engine and gearbox. Not holding my breath...
The little button on the back of the gear selector is the drive mode button

I can't believe, you guys fit in that thing? It's a good looking car. I'm old, I miss the original SE R. I got out of the Army in the late 80s. I bought a Dodge Daytona turbo Z, instead of a Sentra SE R. I will regret that, for the rest of my life!  lol
You guys said it doesn’t have any modes? But it literally has Eco and Sport mode... sport mode is in the gear shift. You guys should’ve known that
I remember 1995 NIssan Sentra...  Wow.  That was an absolute trash. It felt like a tin can on wheel.  This has come a long way.
The Straight Pipes put out a review of the new SR trim manual version of this car. That seems to completely transform the car.
The new Corolla has Multi-link rear suspension
Were you guys still in "L" on that highway merge? Wonder if it would make a difference.
The Corolla has independent rear suspension..... Multi link.

I don’t understand why Nissan doesn’t just use the 7Speed Auto from Infiniti? It would make this car more fun to drive. The Corolla at least has a real 1st gear. Nissan could’ve put the 1.6turbo from the last gen Sentra in this one as a SE-R option

Beautiful lines

Holy shit lol its as if Nissan told car journalists to emphasize on the handling... But yo buddy took it to a whole new level!!! Feeling like he was major shillling!!!! Even you got uncomfrotable.

I bought the 2021 Nissan Sentra SR with premium package this past January 2021.  Great car except for the horrible paint job.  It looked great a few months ago, but it has so many tiny scratches and a hand full of paint chips it spoils my initial feeling about the car.  I never owned a car that had its paint/clearcoat made so inferior and cheap.  It really is disappointing that a brand new car in a matter of months looks like crap.
amazing value car on the surface, unfortunately their terrible CVT prevents this from being a value product
My e36 bmw 325i would pass that thing like a lear jet..        Fast car with power is much safer.. I agree.  Is the L a ford leftover from the truck dash display ??  Hotter than L ?

기존 시장에서는 먹힐만한 요소들이 있지만... 지금 상황에서는 오히려 안팔릴 것이라 생각합니다. 보통수입차 보증이 5년인데 이것은 2년만 해주고 자가 정비가 어렵다는 특징이 있죠. 또한 외관은 참 좋은 다자인 이지만 내부는 yf쏘나타 시절 만큼이나 올드하고 옛날꺼 계속 우려먹는 방식이네요. 그리고 현 환경 규제나 트렌드에 맞지 않는 VQ엔진과 지금도 그런지는 모르겠지만 전자식+유압식 스티어링 시스템도 별로고 차가 마력은 높지만 cvt때문에 고토크 대응이 안되고 좀만 밟으면 변속기가 어리버리 대고... 하... 반자율주행 기능도 없고 ... 아마도 다가올 전기차 시장에 더 역량을 쏟아 부으려고 현 파워트레인 시장쪽은 일부러 손을 놓은건가 싶기도 하네요.
